question_text:
Question 63 
[Transportation Engineering : Traffic Engineering] 
 
The figure presents the trajectories of six vehicles within a time-space domain. The number in the 
parentheses represents unique identification of each vehicle.
(Figure NOT to scale) 
 
The mean speed (in km/hr) of the vehicles in the entire time-space domain is __________ (rounded off to 
nearest integer). 
Ans. 52 to 58
